close() - Method in class com.ociweb.xml.WAX

com.ociweb.xml - package com.ociweb.xml
This package provides a simple API for writing XML documents It is particularly well-suited to writing large XML documents because it doesn't require storing them in a DOM-like structure before outputting them.
